problem_text_cn: 如图,晚上,身高1.5m的小明在距离路灯底部3m的地方,测得自己在路灯下的影子长1m,那么这盏路灯的灯泡距离地面的高度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, at night, Xiao Ming, who is N_0 in height, is N_1 from the bottom of the street light and measured his shadow length N_2 under the street light. Then the height of the light bulb of this street light from the ground is ()
raw_answer:
解:如图,根据题意,BO=BD+DO=3+1=4m,∵AB、CD都与地面垂直,∴AB∥CD,∴△ABO∽△CDO,∴\frac{CD}{AB}=\frac{DO}{BO},
即\frac{1.5}{AB}=\frac{1}{4},
解得AB=6m,
即这盏路灯的灯泡距离地面的高度6m．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用,主要利用了相似三角形对应边成比例的性质,比较简单．
